price: (99) Had these [false deities] been [actual] gods, they would not have come to it, but all are eternal therein.
arabic: لَوۡ كَانَ هَٰٓؤُلَآءِ ءَالِهَةٗ مَّا وَرَدُوهَاۖ وَكُلّٞ فِيهَا خَٰلِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: law kāna hāulāi ālihatan mā waradūhā wakullun fīhā khālidūna
